Title Type Event Nbr Place Modalite Event Organisateur de l'événement Description Date Fin Date Debut Invités spéciaux
{{ event.title }} {{ event.typeEvent }} {{ event.nbreDePlaces }} {{ event.modaliteEvent }} {{ event.image }} {{ event.description }} {{ event.dateF | date: 'dd/MM/yy' }} {{ event.dateD | date: 'dd/MM/yy' }} {{ event.speaker }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Event } from '../../model/Event/event.model'; import { EventsService } from '../../shared/event.service'; import { Observable } from "rxjs"; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-events-front', templateUrl: './list-events-front.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class ListEventsFrontComponent implements OnInit { events!: Observable; constructor(private eventsService: EventsService ,private router: Router){ } ngOnInit() { this.reloadData(); } reloadData() { this.events = this.eventsService.getEvents(); } }
